articles.title: Battle for abortion rights hits America’s streets - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Carrying signs with slogans like "my body, my choice, my right" thousands of women rallied Saturday in Washington at the start of a day of nationwide protests aimed at countering a conservative drive to restrict access to abortions.
